definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: third son of Adam; Ge 4:25; (where expl. from √ [[שִׁית]]), v:Ge 4:26, Ge 5:3, Ge 5:4, Ge 5:6, Ge 5:7, Ge 5:8, 1Ch 1:1; Shq—In [[כָּל־בְּנֵי־שֵׁת]] Nu 24:17 (poem in J), read prob. [[שֵׁאת]] tumult (cf. La 3:47), or [[שְׁאֵת]] (v. sub [[נשׂא]]), cf. Gray.—II. [[שֵׁת]], v. II. [[שׁתה]]. p. 1059
